name: AudioDeviceOutput
type: class
memorycategory: Internal
summary: |
  Accepts audio streams to be rendered out to physical hardware devices such as
  speakers or headphones.
description: |
  Class.AudioDeviceOutput accepts audio streams to be rendered out to physical
  hardware devices such as speakers or headphones. It provides a single
  Input pin that can be targeted by Class.Wire|Wires. Any audio streams
  wired to an Class.AudioDeviceOutput are heard.
codesamples:
  - audio-wiring---device-output
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: AudioDeviceOutput.Player
    summary: |
      A Class.Player who is intended to hear the connected audio streams.
    description: |
      An optional Class.Player who is intended to hear the connected audio
      streams. If left unspecified, the streams wired to this
      Class.AudioDeviceOutput are heard by everyone.
    codesamples: []
    type: Player
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
methods:
  - name: AudioDeviceOutput:GetConnectedWires
    summary: |
      Returns an array of Class.Wire|Wires that are connected to the specified
      pin.
    description: |
      Returns an array of Class.Wire|Wires that are connected to the specified
      pin. Class.AudioDeviceOutput has one "Input" pin.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          An input or output pin on this instance
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: |
          An array of Class.Wire|Wires
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioDeviceOutput:GetInputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that Class.Wire can use in Class.Wire.TargetName
      to connect to this instance via its Class.Wire.TargetInstance property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that Class.Wire can use in Class.Wire.TargetName
      to connect to this instance via its Class.Wire.TargetInstance property.

      For Class.AudioDeviceOutput, this is Input only.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Array
        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioDeviceOutput:GetOutputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that Class.Wire can use in Class.Wire.SourceName
      to connect to this instance via its Class.Wire.SourceInstance property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that Class.Wire can use in Class.Wire.SourceName
      to connect to this instance via its Class.Wire.SourceInstance property.

      For Class.AudioDeviceOutput, there are none.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Array
        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
events:
  - name: AudioDeviceOutput.WiringChanged
    summary: |
      Fires when another instance is connected to or disconnected from the
      Class.AudioDeviceOutput via a Class.Wire.
    description: |
      Event that fires after a Class.Wire becomes connected or disconnected,
      and that Class.Wire is now or was previously connected to a pin on the
      Class.AudioDeviceOutput and to some other wirable instance.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: connected
        type: boolean
        default:
        summary: |
          Whether the instance got connected or disconnected.
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The pin on the Class.AudioDeviceOutput that the Class.Wire
          targets.
      - name: wire
        type: Wire
        default:
        summary: |
          The Class.Wire between the Class.AudioDeviceOutput and the other
          instance.
      - name: instance
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The other instance that is or was connected through the Class.Wire.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    capabilities:
      - Audio
